text: Vicente Aranda Ezquerra (; 9 November 1926 - 26 May 2015), was a Spanish movie director, screenwriter and producer. He was known for directing the 1990 movie Amantes. Aranda died at the age of 88 in Madrid. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Movie directors from Barcelona Category:Spanish movie producers Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Writers from Barcelona
title: Vicente Aranda
